h1. Easy Content Publishing


This feature supports webmasters publishing a web content easily. Webmasters can publish a web content as followings:

- Create new page to publish web content.

- Publish a web content by the 'manage publication' function.

- Publish web contents by the ' content list viewer' navigation.
